attributes.action: allow people who are hunted by their goverment with the penalty of death for being homosexual to claim asylum in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK currently doesn't grant asylum to people who are persecuted for their sexuality, instead hiding behind the fact that they are not responsible for other countries laws.

The UK has denied numerous people asylum, choosing to send them back to be killed for being homosexual, unlike other EU countries which are much more sympathetic to their plight, for example Holland.

We, the undersigned, call upon the Prime Minister and the UK Goverment to appropriately grant asylum to those who face certain death against their human rights and to increase political pressure on goverments who persecute people because of their sexuality.
